title: Tattoo - Novel Updates
genre: Mature   Romance   Slice of Life   Yaoi
tags: Adapted to Drama CD   Artists   Calm Protagonist   Charming Protagonist   Confident Protagonist   Couple Growth   Determined Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Handsome Male Lead   Manly Gay Couple   Mature Protagonist   Modern Day   Older Love Interests   Past Plays a Big Role   Past Trauma   Playful Protagonist   Proactive Protagonist   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Quiet Characters   Slow Romance   Wealthy Characters
author: Bu Wen San Jiu   Not Asking If It's Three Or Nine   不问三九   酸菜坛子
description:
On the night of Xiao Ke’s thirtieth birthday, he shared a table while drinking. The person he shared the table with was a cool man who fit all of his aesthetic desires. It was practically love at first sight.

He was thirty; he had reached that age where he was no longer the awkward twenty-something youth. He would pursue the one he liked without hesitation, no questions asked.

“I want you to give me a tattoo. I want to spend the rest of my life with you.”>
